title: Alumni Events-College of Economic and Social Development
content: Sep 01 2019 Professor Zhang Boli Visited the "Centennial Grand Forum of Nankai" On August 30, 2019, Professor Zhang Boli, academician of the Chinese Academy of Engineering and President of Tianjin University of Traditional Chinese Medicine, visited the "Centennial Grand Forum of Nankai" and gave a special academic report to the alumni of China-Australia Master of Hospital Administration Program. President Cao Xuetao of Nankai University attended the presentation and presen...
